 ```{r,eval=TRUE,echo=FALSE,results="asis"}
.doc_arg(
    type = "logical",
    default = TRUE,
    description = c(
        "If `TRUE`, the subset is a _single_",
        .doc_r6member(),
        "object from the",
        .doc_ref_self(),
        ", in analogy to `list[[elem]]`.<br>",
        "If `FALSE`, the subset itself is a",
        .doc_ref_self(),
        "containing",
        .doc_r6member(suffix = " objects"),
        ", in analogy to `list[elems]`."
    )
)
```
